title: Joliet, IL
content:
Joliet, IL

This is my hometown! I currently live here and
have for the last 20 years!

title: Madrid, Spain
content:
Madrid, Spain

Where my favorite soccer team in the world is located.
It is my dream Vacation to go here and watch them!

title: Manchester, England
content:
Manchester, England

My second favorite soccer team in the world. They play in the
best league so I would love to watch them play a game live as well!

title: Edinburgh, Scotland
content:
Edinburgh, Scotland

I would love to visit this magical looking city!
The architecture is a true thing of beauty! Castles everywhere!

title: Tokyo, Japan
content:
Tokyo, Japan

One of my dream vacations! I am a big anime fan
and would love to visit Japan and experience the culture!

title: Jalisco, Mexico
content:
Jalisco, Mexico

Where I was born! Lived here for two years and
then moved to the United States. This is where my family is from!

title: Lucerne, Switzerland
content:
Lucerne, Switzerland

Having seen the absolutley stunning views and
landscapes, this is a must visit in my life!

title: Bali, Indonesia
content:
Bali, Indonesia

Who doesn't want to visit Bali right?

title: Grindavik, Iceland
content:
Grindavik, Iceland

It has always been one of my life goals to visit
the blue laggons in Iceland!

title: Santorini, Greece
content:
Santorini, Greece

Do I need to say anything else?
